author: AFP
title: Australia calls for probe into response
description: Australia on Sunday called for an independent investigation into the global response to the COVID-19 pandemic, including the World Health Organization’s handling of the crisis.Foreign Minister Marise
content:
Australia on Sunday called for an independent investigation into the global response to the COVID-19 pandemic, including the World Health Organizations handling of the crisis.
Foreign Minister Marise Payne said the country would insist on a review that would… [+369 chars]
